name: SkyCentrics
0:
”Alexa, ask SkyCentrics to set living room to 72.”
”Alexa, ask SkyCentrics to set living room to cool.”
”Alexa, ask SkyCentrics what status living room is in.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: skycentrics
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can control many aspects of the device. You can control temperature, fan speed, and mode. You can ask for it's complete status. You access all of this by simply invoking the name of your device that you set up on the SkyCentrics portal or mobile app.
